basics.label: Director of Information Technology
basics.summary: Performance-driven and accomplished Director of Information Technology offering a unique combination of operations and management experience.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Provided leadership in directing, planning, managing, and implementing the information technology needs of the City of Greensboro.
highlights: Generated a savings of $400K per year with the implementation of VoIP
Implemented on-line payments for parking tickets and utility bills

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Managed the Desktop Services Division, which included the Help Desk, local area network, server administration, training and leasing of computer technology.
highlights: Championed the organizational strategic initiative to implement a client-server environment with Microsoft Exchange and leasing of all computer technology
Managed and directed the installation of 900+ workstations ahead of schedule and under budget

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Installed, maintained, configured and analyzed the data communication needs for the City of Greensboro.
highlights: Project leader on upgrading IBM Mainframe to VSE/ESA

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Repaired, installed, configured and maintained PC's, servers, modems and other communication equipment.
highlights: Designed and installed the wiring and communications infrastructure for student registration
Established redundant communication links to remote sites
